com.ibm.mqttsample.midpapp
Class WmqttGauge

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Item
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Gauge
          com.ibm.mqttsample.midpapp.WmqttGauge
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WmqttGauge
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.Gauge
implements java.lang.Runnable

This extends Gauge to make a gauge that can continuously scroll. This functionality is build into a MIDP 2.0 Gauge, but is not available for MIDP 1.0.

Constructor Summary
WmqttGauge()
          Create a Gauge with no label
WmqttGauge(java.lang.String label)
          Create a Gauge with label the specified label
 
Method Summary
 void run()
          This Runnable method continuosly scrolls the Gauge until it is notified to stop.
 void start()
          Start the gauge scrolling
 void stop()
          Stop the gauge scrolling
